# Helix Framework Documentation

> A comprehensive roleplay framework for Garry's Mod based on NutScript 1.1

## Core Documentation

- [Architecture Overview](architecture.md): Complete framework architecture, initialization sequence, and system design
- [Getting Started](manual/getting-started.md): Installation guide, MySQL setup, and schema bootstrapping
- [Best Practices](best-practices.md): Coding standards, performance optimization, and development guidelines
- [Converting from Clockwork](manual/converting-from-clockwork.md): Migration guide for Clockwork developers

## Framework Systems

### Core Libraries

- [Utility Library (ix.util)](libraries/util.md): File inclusion, type checking, color manipulation, and helper functions
- [Data System (ix.data)](libraries/data.md): Key-value data storage and retrieval system
- [Database System (ix.db)](libraries/database.md): MySQL/SQLite abstraction layer for data persistence
- [Storage System (ix.storage)](libraries/storage.md): Persistent data storage with JSON, YAML, and binary formats
- [Networking (ix.net)](libraries/networking.md): Client-server communication and network message handling

### Character Systems

- [Character System (ix.char)](systems/character.md): Character creation, management, and lifecycle
- [Attributes (ix.attribs)](systems/attributes.md): Character progression and stat systems
- [Inventory System (ix.inventory)](systems/inventory.md): Grid-based inventory management
- [Item System (ix.item)](systems/items.md): Item registration, types, and functionality
- [Faction System (ix.faction)](systems/factions.md): Team/faction management and configuration
- [Class System (ix.class)](systems/classes.md): Job/role assignment within factions

### Gameplay Systems

- [Command System (ix.command)](systems/commands.md): Command registration, argument parsing, and validation
- [Chat System (ix.chatbox)](systems/chat.md): IC/OOC/LOOC chat modes and custom chat types
- [Configuration (ix.config)](systems/configuration.md): Server and client configuration management
- [Options System (ix.option)](systems/options.md): User preferences and client settings
- [Currency System (ix.currency)](systems/currency.md): Money handling and transactions
- [Business System (ix.business)](systems/business.md): Property and business ownership
- [Flag System (ix.flag)](systems/flags.md): Permission flags and access control

### User Interface

- [Derma Overview](ui/derma-overview.md): UI component system and framework
- [HUD System (ix.bar)](ui/hud.md): Status bars, health, stamina, and custom displays
- [Menu System (ix.menu)](ui/menus.md): Main menu, F1 menu, and tab navigation
- [Markup System (ix.markup)](ui/markup.md): Rich text rendering and formatting
- [Inventory UI](ui/inventory.md): Drag-and-drop inventory interface
- [Character Creation](ui/character-creation.md): Character creation and selection screens
- [Notifications](ui/notifications.md): Notice system and status messages

### Plugin Development

- [Plugin System (ix.plugin)](plugins/plugin-system.md): Plugin architecture, loading, and hooks
- [Creating Plugins](plugins/creating-plugins.md): Step-by-step plugin development guide
- [Plugin Structure](plugins/plugin-structure.md): Directory structure and file organization
- [Hook System](plugins/hooks.md): Available hooks and event handling
- [Plugin Best Practices](plugins/best-practices.md): Guidelines for quality plugin development

### Advanced Topics

- [Animation System (ix.anim)](advanced/animations.md): Animation definitions and model support
- [Log System (ix.log)](advanced/logging.md): Event logging and debugging
- [Date/Time System (ix.date)](advanced/datetime.md): Date and time utilities
- [Language System (ix.language)](advanced/localization.md): Multi-language support and localization
- [Meta Tables](advanced/meta-tables.md): Extended Garry's Mod entity methods
- [Type System](advanced/type-system.md): Type validation and command argument types
- [CAMI Integration](advanced/cami.md): Permission and admin system integration

## API Reference

### Core Functions

- [Global Functions (ix.*)](#): Core framework functions and utilities
- [Utility Functions (ix.util.*)](#): Helper and utility functions
- [Meta Extensions](#): Player, Character, Entity, and Item meta table methods

### Library Reference

- [ix.attribs](api/attribs.md): Attribute registration and management
- [ix.char](api/character.md): Character class and methods
- [ix.chatbox](api/chat.md): Chat registration and message handling
- [ix.class](api/class.md): Class registration and assignment
- [ix.command](api/command.md): Command creation and execution
- [ix.config](api/config.md): Configuration variable registration
- [ix.currency](api/currency.md): Currency handling functions
- [ix.data](api/data.md): Data storage and retrieval
- [ix.date](api/date.md): Date and time functions
- [ix.db](api/database.md): Database query functions
- [ix.faction](api/faction.md): Faction registration and methods
- [ix.flag](api/flag.md): Permission flag management
- [ix.inventory](api/inventory.md): Inventory creation and management
- [ix.item](api/item.md): Item registration and handling
- [ix.language](api/language.md): Localization functions
- [ix.log](api/log.md): Logging functions
- [ix.menu](api/menu.md): Menu registration
- [ix.net](api/networking.md): Network message functions
- [ix.notice](api/notice.md): Notification functions
- [ix.option](api/option.md): User option registration
- [ix.plugin](api/plugin.md): Plugin management functions
- [ix.storage](api/storage.md): Data persistence functions
- [ix.util](api/util.md): Utility helper functions

## Item Types

- [Base Items](items/base-items.md): Base item classes and inheritance
- [Weapons](items/weapons.md): Weapon items and configuration
- [Ammunition](items/ammunition.md): Ammo items and weapon integration
- [Bags/Containers](items/bags.md): Container items with internal inventory
- [Outfits](items/outfits.md): Clothing and bodygroup items
- [PAC Outfits](items/pac-outfits.md): PAC3 customization items
- [Custom Item Types](items/custom-items.md): Creating new item types

## Entities

- [Item Entity (ix_item)](entities/ix_item.md): Dropped item entity
- [Money Entity (ix_money)](entities/ix_money.md): Dropped currency entity
- [Shipment Entity (ix_shipment)](entities/ix_shipment.md): Bulk item purchases
- [Vendor Entity (ix_vendor)](entities/ix_vendor.md): NPC vendor entity
- [Custom Entities](entities/custom-entities.md): Creating custom entities

## Base Plugins

- [3D Panel](plugins/3dpanel.md): World panel system
- [3D Text](plugins/3dtext.md): 3D text rendering
- [Ammo Save](plugins/ammosave.md): Ammunition persistence
- [Area](plugins/area.md): Area/zone management system
- [Business](plugins/business.md): Property ownership
- [Chatbox](plugins/chatbox.md): Advanced chat interface
- [Combining](plugins/combining.md): Item combining/crafting
- [Containers](plugins/containers.md): Storage container system
- [Crosshair](plugins/crosshair.md): Weapon crosshair display
- [Doors](plugins/doors.md): Door ownership and access
- [Logging](plugins/logging.md): Server event logging
- [Map Scene](plugins/mapscene.md): Character selection scenes
- [Observer](plugins/observer.md): Spectator mode
- [PAC](plugins/pac.md): PAC3 integration
- [Permakill](plugins/permakill.md): Permanent character death
- [Persistence](plugins/persistence.md): Map/world persistence
- [Property Protection](plugins/propprotect.md): Prop ownership
- [Recognition](plugins/recognition.md): Character recognition/fame
- [Save Items](plugins/saveitems.md): Item persistence
- [Spawns](plugins/spawns.md): Spawn point management
- [Spawn Saver](plugins/spawnsaver.md): Player spawn locations
- [Stamina](plugins/stamina.md): Stamina and endurance system
- [Strength](plugins/strength.md): Strength attribute system
- [Third Person](plugins/thirdperson.md): Third-person camera
- [Typing](plugins/typing.md): Typing indicator
- [Vendor](plugins/vendor.md): NPC vendor system
- [Weapon Selection](plugins/wepselect.md): Weapon selection UI

## Schema Development

- [Schema Structure](schema/structure.md): Schema organization and files
- [Schema Configuration](schema/configuration.md): Schema-specific settings
- [Creating Factions](schema/factions.md): Faction definition and setup
- [Creating Classes](schema/classes.md): Class definition and configuration
- [Creating Items](schema/items.md): Schema-specific items
- [Custom Commands](schema/commands.md): Schema command registration
- [Custom Hooks](schema/hooks.md): Schema hook implementation
- [Custom Derma](schema/derma.md): Schema-specific UI elements

- [Creating Commands](guides/commands.md): Command system tutorial

- [Database Operations](guides/database.md): Working with the database
- [Networking Guide](guides/networking.md): Client-server communication
- [UI Development](guides/ui-development.md): Creating Derma interfaces
- [Hook Usage](guides/hooks.md): Understanding and using hooks
- [Debugging](guides/debugging.md): Debugging techniques and tools

## Configuration Reference

- [Server Configuration](config/server.md): Server-side settings
- [Character Settings](config/characters.md): Character-related options
- [Chat Settings](config/chat.md): Chat system configuration
- [Appearance Settings](config/appearance.md): Visual customization
- [Inventory Settings](config/inventory.md): Inventory configuration
- [Database Configuration](config/database.md): MySQL/SQLite setup

- [Common Issues](troubleshooting/common-issues.md): Frequently encountered problems
- [Database Issues](troubleshooting/database.md): Database connection and query problems

## Community Resources

- Official Website: https://gethelix.co
- Documentation: https://docs.gethelix.co
- Plugin Center: https://plugins.gethelix.co
- Discord: https://discord.gg/2AutUcF
- GitHub: https://github.com/nebulouscloud/helix
- HL2 RP Schema: https://github.com/nebulouscloud/helix-hl2rp
- Skeleton Schema: https://github.com/nebulouscloud/helix-skeleton

## Version Information

- Framework: Helix
- Base: NutScript 1.1
- Platform: Garry's Mod
- Language: Lua
- Documentation Generated: 2025-11-05
